definition: car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159
vehicle that gives one a free ride/(fig.) (ride on sb's) coattails/(take advantage of) an opportunity

sentences.english: Seeking good fortune at the Che Kung Festival Fair.
sentences.chinese: 市民在车公诞市场选购风车祈求好运。

sentences.english: Which is sort of a childhood nursery rhyme. And then they cut to this pig and a car with two pin wheels,
sentences.chinese: 这是小时候的儿歌。然后镜头切换到猪和有风车的车，

sentences.english: In the center of the village was a big windmill. A gray church stood across from the windmill.
sentences.chinese: 村子中央有一座很大的风车，对面是一座灰色的教堂。

sentences.english: Cargo Tommy, those broken windmills will be our guideposts.
sentences.chinese: 沿着那些被破坏的风车降落。

sentences.english: A rough approximation would be the dual spirals in pinwheel.
sentences.chinese: 大致近似于纸风车上的双重螺旋线。

sentences.english: Use paynes gray in a watercolor windmill painting to add cool toned shadows.
sentences.chinese: 在使用佩恩尼斯风车画水彩凉灰色色调添加阴影。

sentences.english: I would fly to Holland to see the windmills and the tulips.
sentences.chinese: 我要飞到荷兰去看风车和郁金香。

sentences.english: How tall is the wind turbine on Lamma Island?
sentences.chinese: 港灯位于南丫岛上的风力发电站，风车高度为多少米？

sentences.english: The man that made the windmill and the between the legs dunk popular.
sentences.chinese: 他让大风车和双腿之间的扣篮成为流行。

sentences.english: These devices act like underwater windmills, with blades that rotate as the tide flows through them.
sentences.chinese: 这种装置就像水下风车一样，叶片随流过的潮汐旋转。

sentences.english: An exposition of windmills located on the highest hill.
sentences.chinese: 在这里最高的山上的立着各种风车。

sentences.english: Just one whiff flips the switch on courtship-initiating brain pathways.
sentences.chinese: 在大脑中求爱的欲望就如同吹起的翻转风车。

sentences.english: The windmill never strays in search of the wind.
Like waterwheels, windmills were among the original prime movers that replaced human Beings as a source of power.
sentences.chinese: 和水车一样，风车是最早代替人力的动力机之一。

sentences.english: Windmills are a characteristic feature of the Mallorcan landscape.
sentences.chinese: 风车是马略卡岛风光的一个典型的特色。

sentences.english: In the hole of the “underpants, ” several wind turbines will generate electricity.
sentences.chinese: 裤衩下面的空洞可以安装风车发电。
